name: Mia Kuznetsova
routine: Mia Kuznetsova goes to bed no later than 11pm and wakes up at 6:30am to get ready for school.
occupation: Mia Kuznetsova is a high school student with aspirations to become a biomedical engineer.
thoughts: Mia Kuznetsova is nervous about her upcoming final exams in the afternoon of February 2nd, especially in calculus, and has been studying diligently.
lifestyle: Mia Kuznetsova enjoys volunteering at her local community center on weekends and likes cycling as her main form of exercise.

name: Riku Tanaka
routine: Riku Tanaka goes to bed at around 1 am and wakes up at 8 am to catch his first class.
occupation: He is a university student majoring in robotics, with classes usually from 10 am to 5 pm.
thoughts: Recently, he has been focusing on preparing for a robotics competition that was taking place on February 3rd, 2024.
lifestyle: Riku enjoys Japanese cuisine, often experiments with cooking, prefers high-tech gadgets, and his hobbies include gaming and manga.

name: Elise Martin
routine: Elise is usually in bed by 10pm and wakes up at 5:45am for an early morning run.
occupation: Elise works as a civil lawyer and spends her workdays from 9am to 6pm in court or preparing cases in her office.
thoughts: She has been pondering the implications of a recent ruling and is preparing an appeal to submit by February 4th, 2024.
lifestyle: Following a mostly vegan diet, Elise enjoys fresh, farm-to-table meals and takes pride in her urban gardening project. For relaxation, she prefers reading legal thrillers and practices mindfulness meditation to manage her stressful work life.
